topComments.author: A S
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar √© perfeito se voc√™ almeja o tema da princesa da Disney. Infelizmente, ficou aqu√©m da comida e servi√ßos. Os mexilh√µes no aperitivo n√£o eram frescos. Embora o caldo fosse muito bom. A carne de porco no Magic Carpet Ride estava super seca (carbonizada e s√≥lida at√© o n√∫cleo). O molho pesto na massa de frango grelhado foi super irresist√≠vel. Isso me jogou fora e eu n√£o conseguia terminar o meu prato. A mousse de chocolate no Clock Strikes Twelves era super densa e rica ao ponto de ser dif√≠cil de engolir. No entanto, o sorvete de caramelo que veio com ele foi delicioso - leve e n√£o excessivamente doce. A melhor sobremesa que voc√™ pode obter √© o cheesecake Jaq e Gus. Era leve e cremoso e √© assim que a sobremesa de um jantar fino deve ser. Al√©m disso, voc√™ pode pagar extra para pedir o "Slipper Perdido", √© uma sobremesa perfeita se voc√™ quiser surpreender algu√©m. A gratuidade j√° estava inclu√≠da no valor pr√©-pago. No entanto, nenhum dos gar√ßons e gar√ßonetes nos disse e a Disney foi esperta o suficiente para ainda incluir a se√ß√£o de dicas em suas contas. Tenha cuidado com isso.  (Original) This place is perfect if you aim for the Disney princess theme. Unfortunately, it fell short on the food and services. The mussels in the appetizer was not fresh. Though the broth was quite good. The pork on the Magic Carpet Ride was super dry (charred and rock solid to the core). Pesto sauce on the grilled chicken pasta was super overwhelming. It threw me off and I could not finish my plate. Chocolate mousse on the Clock Strikes Twelves was super dense and rich to the point that it was hard to swallow. Though, the caramel ice cream that came with it was delicious - light and not overly sweet. The best dessert you can get is the Jaq and Gus cheesecake. It was light and creamy and it is what fine dining dessert should be like. Also, you can pay extra to order the "Lost Slipper", it is a perfect dessert if you want to surprise someone. Gratuity was already included in the prepaid amount. However, non of the waiters and waitresses tell us and Disney was slick enough to still include the tips section on your bills. Be careful with that.

topComments.author: David Engle
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Fa√ßa reservas no dia em que voc√™ tiver permiss√£o (use o aplicativo Genie + e ele informar√°), pois quase n√£o h√° como subir e entrar, a menos que algu√©m cancele assim que voc√™ subir.  Este √© um DEVE FAZER na minha opini√£o se tiver filhos mais novos. Sim, √© caro. Sim, as op√ß√µes de comida n√£o s√£o √≥timas para crian√ßas. Sim, as op√ß√µes de comida podem n√£o ser √≥timas para adultos se voc√™ estiver apenas procurando por frango empanado e batatas fritas. Mas a experi√™ncia √© imbat√≠vel. Desde o momento em que voc√™ sobe as escadas sinuosas e seus filhos s√£o tratados como pr√≠ncipes e princesas, at√© a primeira vez que voc√™ v√™ os olhos de seus filhos se arregalarem quando Cinderela sai, at√© a sobremesa de cupcake fa√ßa voc√™ mesmo, at√© quando voc√™ sai o restaurante e recebem varinhas de fadas e pequenas espadas... cada momento foi especial. Eu realmente n√£o posso recomendar esta experi√™ncia o suficiente!  Postei um v√≠deo para dar uma pequena no√ß√£o de como √© caminhar at√© o restaurante. Uma grande surpresa para um pai ou pais dar a sua fam√≠lia. Inesquec√≠vel.  (Original) Book reservations the day you're allowed to (use the Genie+ app and it will let you know) as there is almost no way to walk up and get in unless someone cancels right as you walk up.  This is a MUST DO in my opinion if you have younger kids. Yes, it's expensive. Yes, the food options are not great for kids. Yes, the food options may not be great for adults if you're just looking for chicken fingers and fries. But the experience is unbeatable. From the moment you walk up the winding stairs and your kids are treated as princes and princesses, to the first time you see your kids' eyes go wide when Cinderella comes out, to the make-your-own cupcake dessert, to when you leave the restaurant and are given fairy wands and little swords... every moment was special. I really can't recommend this experience enough!  I posted a video to give just a small sense of what it's like to walk up to the restaurant. A great surprise for a parent or parents to give their family. Unforgettable.

topComments.author: Hayley Verheyen
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu vi coment√°rios mistos sobre CRT. Tivemos o melhor tempo. A nossa gar√ßonete foi incr√≠vel e t√£o doce! A salada de tomate parecia estranha, mas tinha um sabor t√£o bom! Peixes e sobremesas foram √≥timos! Minha filha pegou a uva e queijo, Mac e queijo, arroz e milho, e o cupcake. O dela n√£o era nada chique, mas ela adorou! O cupcake era sua parte favorita. O voo da Royal foi √≥timo! O vermelho √© realmente muito doce. Est√°vamos longe da Cinderela, mas conseguimos v√™-la quando sa√≠mos. Obrigado Disney por um almo√ßo m√°gico para nossas princesinhas!  (Original) I have seen mixed reviews about CRT. We had the best time. Our waitress was amazing and so sweet! Tomato salad looked weird but tasted so good! Fish and desserts were great! My daughter got the grape and cheese, Mac and cheese, rice and corn, and the cupcake. Hers was nothing fancy but she loved it! The cupcake was her favorite part. The Royal flight was great! The red is actually really sweet. We were far away from Cinderella but we got to see her when we left. Thank you Disney for a magical lunch for our little princesses!

topComments.author: James Stacey
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Todos os anos, a esposa e eu viajamos para a Disney World para comemorar nosso anivers√°rio de casamento. Este ano, em homenagem ao nosso 15¬∫, tivemos sorte e marcamos uma reserva para a CRT. A comida e o servi√ßo estavam excelentes. Voc√™ receber√° um aperitivo, prato principal, sobremesa e bebida n√£o alco√≥lica, e a Disney exige que voc√™ pague antecipadamente as refei√ß√µes. A comida demorou um pouco para sair, mas tudo estava bem temperado e preparado conforme pedimos. Enquanto esper√°vamos pelo nosso jantar, havia muita decora√ß√£o incr√≠vel da Disney para examinar e encontrar toques fofos. A pr√≥pria Cinderela visitou o refeit√≥rio v√°rias vezes durante nossa refei√ß√£o, acenando e iluminando a sala com seu sorriso enquanto as crian√ßas ao redor enlouqueciam. √â uma experi√™ncia reconfortante ver algo t√£o simples trazer felicidade aos pequenos. Embora caro, especialmente se voc√™ tem uma fam√≠lia grande, se voc√™ tiver a sorte de marcar uma reserva, eu digo faz√™-lo, pois √© uma experi√™ncia √∫nica na vida.  (Original) Every year, the wife and I travel to Disney World to celebrate our Wedding Anniversary. This year in honor of our 15th, we got lucky and scored a reservation to CRT. The food and service were excellent. You will receive an appetizer, entree, dessert, and non-alcoholic drink, and Disney does require you to prepay for the meals. The food was a little slow in coming out, but everything was nicely seasoned and cooked as we asked. As we waited for our dinner, there was plenty of awesome Disney decor to examine and find cute touches. Cinderella herself visited the dining hall several times during our meal, waving and lighting the room with her smile as the surrounding children lost their minds. It is a heartwarming experience to see something so simple bring happiness to the little ones. While expensive, especially if you have a large family, if you have the luck to score a reservation, I say do it as it is a once-in-a-lifetime experience.

topComments.author: Scott Brown
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Hoje em dia, √© apenas Cinderela, e n√£o uma combina√ß√£o de princesas, provavelmente devido a menos espa√ßo no ch√£o do restaurante para distanciamento social. N√≥s encontramos Cinderela no andar de baixo antes de irmos para o caf√© da manh√£. Boa sele√ß√£o de doces fornecidos na entrada, morangos enormes. Menu habitual para o caf√©-da-manh√£, eu tinha a torrada francesa que era bom, mas um pouco seco. Eu acho que sem as princesas extras, voc√™ est√° basicamente pagando um pr√™mio por estar sentado no castelo, o que reduz uma classifica√ß√£o de estrelas para mim.  (Original) These days it's only Cinderella rather than a combination of princesses, presumably due to less space on the restaurant floor for social distancing. We met Cinderella downstairs before heading up for breakfast. Nice selection of pastries provided on entry, huge strawberries. Usual menu for breakfast, I had the French Toast which was nice but a little dry. I think without the extra princesses, you are basically paying a premium for being seated in the castle which bumps it down a star rating for me.

topComments.author: Jason Fair (Nomadic Nerd Project)
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este foi um final t√£o m√°gico para a nossa viagem √† Disney. Comer dentro do Castelo! sim. A atmosfera era incr√≠vel. Seu nome anunciado para entrar, enquanto √© aclamado como realeza por toda parte. Foi realmente m√°gico. A comida estava muito boa. Fiquei um pouco decepcionado com o prato Royal Cheese, pois mencionou que eram v√°rios queijos √† base de plantas. Em vez disso, era apenas o queijo de alho e cebolinha do myoko. Ainda bom. As refei√ß√µes eram saborosas, o servi√ßo excelente, e a sobremesa Clock Strikes Twelve foi uma das melhores sobremesas que j√° tivemos. Amei Cinderela. Ela fez um √≥timo trabalho.  (Original) This was such a magical ending to our trip to Disney. Eating inside the Castle! Yes. The atmosphere was amazing. Your name announced to enter, while being hailed as royalty throughout. It was truly magical. The food was very good. I was a little disappointed with the Royal Cheese platter as it mentioned it was various plant based cheeses. Instead, it was just myoko's garlic & chive cheese. Still good. The meals were tasty, the serivice great, and the Clock Strikes Twelve dessert was one of the best desserts we've ever had. Loved Cinderella. She did a great job.
